vistra.framework.traversal.step

Class AbstractStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • vistra.framework.traversal.step.AbstractStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStep, ICommand
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackEdgeStep, CrossEdgeStep, DiscardedEdgeStep, ForwardEdgeStep, InitializedVertexStep, SolutionMemberStep, UpdatedVertexStep, VisitStep

    abstract class AbstractStep
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStep
    An abstract step. Delegates its execute- and undo-method to an IItemStateCommandHandler (macro command).
    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)
